title: Norman Reedus Hints Death Stranding 2?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.30.21
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week discussing the possibility of Death Stranding 2, Suda 51 wanting to make a Deadpool game, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:13 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now titled: Greg’s Babysitter Power Rankings
This Thursday you’re getting a new episode of The Blessing Show. That’s going live at 7am PT with a YouTube premiere on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:40 - Norman Reedus Says Another Death Stranding Game “Is In Negotiations” - Stephanie Minor @ The Gamer
00:20:40 - Suda 51 wants to make a Deadpool game - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:32:00 - Finally: Fortnite Adds Mike Lowrey - Wesley LeBlanc @ IGN
00:33:05 - Finally: Fortnite Adds Mike Lowrey - Wesley LeBlanc @ IGN
00:37:50 - NetEase is in Talks to Hire the Creator of Yakuza (the games) - Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg
00:45:25 - From Nibel: Disco Elysium has been rated for Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S and Switch
00:49:04 - Out today
00:49:50 - Squad Up:Brian(Mobile) - Alliance name: KFBFs
ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS
Required Reading: Naughty By Nature – Naughty Dog Leadership Reflects On The Studio's History - Ben Reeves @ GameInformer
https://www.gameinformer.com/exclusive-interview/2021/08/28/naughty-by-nature-naughty-dog-leadership-reflects-on-the-studios
00:51:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam & Gary Whitta
